H0.text: Who was Poopdeck Pappys most famous son. Bluto

H1.text: Who was Poopdeck Pappys most famous son. Swee'Pea

H2.text: Who was Poopdeck Pappys most famous son. Eugene the Jeep

H3.text: Who was Poopdeck Pappys most famous son. Popeye

A4.text: Popeye is the spitting image of Poopdeck Pappy, though Pappy has a white beard.

A5.text: Pappy's history with Popeye has gradually been retconned in modern times.
